thread.title: HBO Chief Richard Plepler Makes Case for Big Providers to Offer Its Streaming Product
thread.title_full: HBO Chief Richard Plepler Makes Case for Big Providers to Offer Its Streaming Product - WSJ

author: Amol Sharma
title: HBO Chief Richard Plepler Makes Case for Big Providers to Offer Its Streaming Product
text:
LAGUNA BEACH, Calif.—HBO Chief Executive Richard Plepler made a case for big broadband providers to market the company’s new standalone streaming service, saying it would help both sides grow without compromising the traditional pay-television business.
Speaking at The Wall Street Journal’s WSJD Live event here, Mr. Plepler noted that companies like Comcast Corp., Charter Communications Inc. and AT&T Inc. have millions of... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
